subject: verbal_reasoning

content.text:
Use the clues to work out the answer.

I am a type of building.
I often have many rooms.
I am not a house.
People work in me.
I am taller than I am wide.

explanation: The clues point to a building with many rooms where people work, ruling out house, shack, bungalow and igloo. An office block fits all the clues.

content.text:
Use the clues to work out the answer.

I am a number.
I am less than 60.
I am a multiple of 7.
My digits add up to an odd number.
I am greater than 20.

subject: verbal_reasoning

content.text:
Use the clues to work out the answer.

I am found in a garden.
I am a type of plant.
I am often red.
I am a fruit.
I grow on a vine.

explanation: The clues point to a plant, often red, that is a fruit found in a garden and that grows on a vine. Of the options, only a tomato fits all criteria.

subject: verbal_reasoning

content.text:
Use the clues to work out the answer.

I am a word.
I am an adjective.
I describe a feeling.
I mean almost the same as 'delighted'.
I have nine letters.

explanation: The clues point to a nine-letter adjective describing a feeling of delight. The only word that fits is 'Ecstatic'.

subject: verbal_reasoning

content.text:
Use the clues to work out the answer.

I am an object.
I am used in sports.
I am round.
I am often kicked.
I am hollow.

explanation: The clues suggest an object used in sports, is round, often kicked, and is hollow. A football is the only option that fits all these criteria.
